description: Gets information about the approval states for a specified pull request. Approval states only apply to pull requests that have one or more approval rules applied to them.

parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID for the pull request.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID for the pull request revision.

nested_items.name: approvals
nested_items.description: Information about users who have approved the pull request.

nested_items.name: userArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user.

nested_items.name: approvalState
nested_items.description: The state of the approval, APPROVE or REVOKE. REVOKE states are not stored.
